body: Unlike magic items, spellcasting for hire is listed separately from the town's base value, since spellcasting is limited by the level of the available spellcasters in town. This line lists the highest-level spell available for purchase from spellcasters in town. A town's base spellcasting level depends on its type.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Settlements/Settlements in Play/The Settlement Stat Block/Spellcasting
name: Spellcasting
